        public int getMaxItemsPerPage()
        Description copied from interface: OperationContext
        Returns the current max number of items per batch.
        Specified by:

      • setMaxItemsPerPage

        public void setMaxItemsPerPage(int maxItemsPerPage)
        Description copied from interface: OperationContext
        Set the max number of items per batch for operations that return lists. This option does not restrict the number of returned items. To retrieve an excerpt (page) of a list, see ItemIterable.getPage(int).
        Specified by:
        setMaxItemsPerPage in interface OperationContext
        Parameters:
        maxItemsPerPage - max number of items (must be >0)
